label: Title
tooltip: The name of the IATI activity

label: Reported by
tooltip: The name of the organisation that published this IATI data

label: Implemented by
tooltip: The name of the organisation(s) implementing this activity

label: Country/Region
tooltip: The name of the country or region for this activity.  Note: when an IATI activity has multiple country/regions, the first ten countries/regions will be displayed here. You can download the detailed data from the Download link above.

label: Total Amount (USD)
tooltip: The total sum of the commitment transactions for this activity

label: Covid-19-specific (USD)
tooltip: The total sum of commitment transactions that are specifically flagged as COVID-19 related.

label: Humanitarian?
tooltip: Whether this activity is flagged as being humanitarian, development, or a mix.
This is the organisation that provided the IATI data
A firm, written obligation from a donor to provide a specified amount of funds, under particular terms and conditions, for specific purposes, for the benefit of the recipient.

Outgoing funds that are placed at the disposal of a recipient (disbursement) or are spent on goods and services for the activity (expenditure). Please see the About this Tool tab for more information.
Organizations that publish data to the IATI Registry.

We use an algorithm to determine if a transaction is related to COVID-19. Changing this setting to ‘strict’ will show only transactions with a high degree of confidence. Learn more on the About this Tool tab.
Changing this filter to ‘yes’ will show only transactions reported with the humanitarian aid flag. Learn more on the About this Tool tab.
A firm, written obligation from a donor to provide a specified amount of funds, under particular terms and conditions, for specific purposes, for the benefit of the recipient.

Outgoing funds that are placed at the disposal of a recipient (disbursement) or are spent on goods and services for the activity (expenditure). Please see the About this Tool tab for more information.
